Gamemaster
==========

Concepts
********

Gamemaster allows for controlling levels and level status via the API. It is worth
experimenting with the information provided in the level status as it gives feedback
on risk limits and other messages that appear in the web interface when the level
is active.

Brief docs can be found on the `Stockfighters forums`_.

.. _Stockfighters forums: https://discuss.starfighters.io/t/the-gm-api-how-to-start-stop-restart-resume-trading-levels-automagically/143
